Reviews.Title: Poor Quality Photos
Reviews.Author: Melina R. "MR"
Reviews.Content: This camera was advertised as a good camera for an 8 year old.  I gave this camera to my daughter for her 8th birthday.  The picture quality is very poor - very dark.I would skip this and go for a slightly more expensive camera.

Reviews.Title: Got it for a birthday
Reviews.Author: dey
Reviews.Content: My niece love the camera which I got it for her birthday she already using itShe was glad she got it

Reviews.Title: Horrible camera!
Reviews.Author: BellaBoo
Reviews.Content: horrible pictures, grainy, phone from 10 years ago took better pictures than this, feels like a toy camera!!I am sending back asap.
